definition: to inspect/to examine/to be aware/to pay a visit (to one's parents or elders)
to save/to economize/to do without/to omit/to leave out/province/(archaic) central government department
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: Six practical function of living, Special query Voltage and electric quantity, saving power visible.
sentences.chinese: 六大生活實用功能，特設電壓電量查詢，省電看得見。

sentences.english: Automatically updates slowly, water power-saving devices.
sentences.chinese: 自動待機慢轉，省水省電裝置。

sentences.english: In power-down mode, the digital outputs are driven to a high impedance state.
sentences.chinese: 在省電模式下，數字輸出被置爲高阻狀態。

sentences.english: The pull-style night curtain equipped provides more energy saving at night running.
sentences.chinese: 配有拉出式夜簾，使夜間運行時更節能省電。

sentences.english: She's neurotic about switching lights off at home to save eletricity .
sentences.chinese: 她爲省電把家裏的燈都關了，真是神經病。

sentences.english: To save energy I kept the flashlight off.
sentences.chinese: 爲了省電我關了手電筒。

sentences.english: With special raw material (raw rubber bearing) and small friction coefficient; electricity -saving.
sentences.chinese: 含特殊原料原橡膠軸承，摩擦係數小，更省電。

sentences.english: IGPS frequency conversion power, Steady electric function, saving the energy and power.
sentences.chinese: IGPS變頻電源，電器性能穩定，節能省電。

sentences.english: But for most of the shows people watch, LCD screens use significantly less electricity.
sentences.chinese: 但對於看電視的人而言，液晶屏幕明顯更加省電。

sentences.english: You can use less electricity to preserve resources.
sentences.chinese: 你可以以省電的方式去節省資源。

sentences.english: In addition, the prosthetic hand has the feature of auto power-off to save the energy.
sentences.chinese: 此外並具有自動斷電機制，可達到節能省電之目標。

sentences.english: Flexible power-down options allow significant power savings, when desired.
sentences.chinese: 需要時，靈活的省電選項可以明顯降低功耗。

sentences.english: LED type exit signs are installed in the back-of-house area.
sentences.chinese: 後勤區域的出口標誌都採用了省電的二極管。
新型綠色光源，超級省電。

sentences.english: The light of the firefly does not produce heat.
sentences.chinese: 螢光燈較白熾燈省電且發熱少。

sentences.english: Eight practical function of living, Special query Voltage and electric quantity, saving power visible.
sentences.chinese: 八大生活實用功能，特設電壓電量查詢，省電看得見。

definition: portable gas stove (fueled by a gas cartridge)
